channel.title: Auto retaliate
channel.description: hey, ive been tryin to work this out for ages .. how to make the auto retaliate buttons teleport you places .. it can be done as i have seen it on another server .. ive tried searching for the cases they aint their please someone help me someone out there has gotta know thanks guys

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

umm shops.cfg, you used too many tabs… try

shop = 69	Fairy Shop		2	2	1052	100

that should onyl have 2 tabs, using too many tabs for .cfg files can make what i like to call “hidden” errors

Read full topic

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

sure there you go

public void openUpShop(int ShopID) { sendFrame126(server.shopHandler.ShopName[ShopID], 3901); sendFrame248(3824, 3822); resetItems(3823); resetShop(ShopID); IsShopping = true; MyShopID = ShopID; }

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Ah right. I had this problem when i started making my first server. I did everything i needed to do and it wouldn;t show the shop. I never found out why this happened. I was using project wolf(really not a very good source lol) and i couldn’t get it to work. Now that i know what im doing in java, im guessing its to do with the code that opens the shop. Can u open your client.java and search “public void openUpShop” and post the method here so i can see why its not working.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

thanks man and one more thing … im using allstar v1 as my source ok and i wanna add a shop … this is what i do in autospawn

spawn =	534	3284	2772	0	0	0	0	0	1	fairy shop

in shops

shop = 69	Fairy Shop					2	2	1052	100

client

} else if (NPCID == 534) { // Fairy Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 69; // Fairy Shop
i save compile and run without any errors and then i go trade and nothing comes up?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Yer i can help you with making shop currency tokkul. Open up your client.java and search

public boolean sellItem

scroll down untill you see

addItem(995, TotPrice2);

or something similar to that. That is the code to add the amount of money that the shop will buy the item for. 995 is the item id for money(coins). Change that to the item id for tokkul. Now when you sell and item, it will give you tokkul instead of coins.
Thats only half of it though. You still need to make it so you buy items with tokkul not money.

search this

public boolean buyItem

Now if your server code is organised well, this should be just below the sell item but it doesnt matter if its not.

Scroll down untill you see this.

deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);

this deletes the price the item costs. this will delete the coins from your invent. replace both the 995’s with the item id for tokkul. Then your server shop currency will be tokkul.

I havent tried this i just looked through my client.java and wrote what to do. if you have any problems with it then pm me and i will be glad to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:

omg dude thank you so much … i would rep you but i cant and btw do you know how to make a shop accept tokkul only

Read full topic

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Go to your client.java, and search “case 185:”. This is the packet that is sent when almost any button is clicked. Type in this code inside case 185:

case 150:
teleportToX = xcoord here;
teleportToY = ycoord here;
heightLevel = heightlevel;
break;

case 151:
teleportToX = xcoord here;
teleportToY = ycoord here;
heightLevel = heightlevel;
break;

Obviously replace xcoord here, ycoord here and heightlevel with you teleport x coord, y coord and the heightlevel.
Hope this was helpful

Read full topic
